      • writeLoginActivity

        public static void writeLoginActivity​(java.lang.Boolean successful)
        Writes login attempts to a txt file. ZonedDateTime, username, and whether the attempt is successful is written.
        Parameters:
        successful - true if successful login, false if unsuccessful
